EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Far Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Sneak Attack Die. +10 Positive Spell Power. Your Point Blank Shot and Ranged Sneak Attack range is increased by 5 meters for each Deepwood Stalker Core Ability you possess.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Sneak Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Sneak Attack Die. +10 Positive Spell Power. +1 Use of Wild Empathy. Each Deepwood Stalker Core Ability you acquire after this one also grants +1 use.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Called Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a melee or ranged attack that deals extra damage and renders a target vulnerable to sneak attacks. Passive: +10 Positive Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Exposing Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals +20% Damage +1 Critical Multiplier +1 Critical Threat Range Cooldown: 6 seconds Melee Attack: Performs a melee attack with a +4 bonus to-hit. On Damage: The target will become momentarily confused and rendered vulnerable to sneak attacks for four seconds as if affected by the bluff skill.
Passive: +10 Positive Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sniper Shot
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Deals +20% Damage +2 Critical Multiplier +2 Critical Threat Range Cooldown: 6 seconds Ranged Attack: Performs a ranged attack with a +4 bonus to-hit. On Damage: The target will become momentarily confused and rendered vulnerable to sneak attacks for four seconds as if affected by the bluff skill.
Passive: +10 Positive Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Advanced Sneak Attack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
+1 Sneak Attack Die. You gain a +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range with your equipped weapons. (This does not apply to Shields or Unarmed).
+10 Positive Spell Power.
Your attacks now bypass 10% fortification.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Mark of the Hunted
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Activate: Expend a use of Wild Empathy. Your currently selected enemy receives -25% Fortification, -10 Armor Class, -10 Spell Resistance, and suffers a -4 penalty to all ability scores for 3 minutes. This effect also works on bosses and Raid bosses.
Passive: Your attacks bypass an additional 10% Fortification. You also gain +2 Damage when attacking Favored Enemies.
Passive: +10 Positive Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Horizon Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You gain +4 Dexterity and +3 Sneak Attack Dice. You are always considered to be in Point Blank Shot and Ranged Sneak Attack range.
+20 Positive Spell Power
+20 Melee Power
+20 Ranged Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Favored Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[2/4/6] Armor Class when attacked by Favored Enemies. You gain +[1/2/3] to Saving Throws against spells or effects from Favored Enemies.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Stealthy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Hide and Move silently. Rank 3: You gain +1 additional Sneak Attack Die.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Increased Empathy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Diplomacy and Wild Empathy uses per rest. +[4/8/12] Positive Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Versatile Empathy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Wild Empathy ability now also pacifies Vermin Rank 2: Your Wild Empathy ability now also pacifies Elementals and Vermin. +[4/8] Positive Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Tendon Cut
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Deals +[10/20/30]% Damage Cooldown: 15 seconds Melee Attack: On Sneak Attack: Slow your enemy's movement by 50% for 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Survivalist I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 10 hit points. While wearing Light Armor you gain 3 Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Faster Sneaking
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[20/35/50]% movement speed while sneaking.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Empathic Healing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Spell-like ability: You may expend a use of Wild Empathy to produce a Lesser Vigor/Mass Lesser Vigor effect. Cooldown: 6 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Improved Weapon Finesse
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can use your Dexterity modifier for damage when wielding thrown weapons, and melee weapons with which you can use your Dexterity modifier to hit. (Longbows and Shortbows use your Dexterity modifier by default).

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select Damage or Skill Boost

EnhancementSelection.Name: Action Boost: Melee/Ranged Power Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +[10/20/30] Action Boost bonus to Melee/Ranged Power for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Action Boost: Skill Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +[2/4/6] Action Boost bonus to all skills for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Survivalist II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain an additional 20 hit points. While wearing Light Armor you gain an additional 4 Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Thrill of the Hunt
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[1/2/3] damage for 6 seconds after damaging an opponent beneath 50% health.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Favored Hunter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +[1/2/3] to hit and damage when attacking a Favored Enemy.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Aimed Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Attack: Performs a ranged attack with +10 to hit and +1 Critical Damage Multiplier. On Damage: If you are in the Archer's Focus stance and Manyshot is not active, gain three stacks of Archer's Focus. Cooldown: 10 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Survivalist III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain an additional 30 hit points. While wearing Light Armor you gain an additional 5 Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Killer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you kill a target, you gain a 5% Morale bonus to Melee Doublestrike and Extra Shot Chance for 15 seconds. Weak enemies will not always produce this effect. The Killer buff can stack up to [2/3/4] times. (Repeating Crossbows have a reduced chance to produce Extra Shots.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Merciful Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Deals +30% Damage Cooldown: 15 seconds Ranged attack: On Sneak Attack: If the target is below 50% health, deal 500 damage. This damage scales with 100% Ranged Power.
Taking this enhancement also grants Merciful Strike, a Melee version of the exact same ability.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Leg Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Deals +20% Damage Cooldown: 10 seconds Ranged Attack: On Damage: Slow your enemy's movement by 50% for 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Extra Favored Enemy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
A new forest-dwelling creature type is added to your list of favored enemies.
You gain +2 damage against all of your favored enemies for each favored enemy on your list. For example, if you have 4 favored enemies, you gain +8 damage against each of those 4 types of enemies.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Animal
EnhancementSelection.Description: You deal extra damage to animals

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Dragon
EnhancementSelection.Description: You deal extra damage to dragons

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Dwarf
EnhancementSelection.Description: You deal extra damage to dwarves

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Elf
EnhancementSelection.Description: You deal extra damage to elves

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Giant
EnhancementSelection.Description: You deal extra damage to giants

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Gnoll
EnhancementSelection.Description: You deal extra damage to gnolls

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Goblinoid
EnhancementSelection.Description: You deal extra damage to goblinoids

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Halfling
EnhancementSelection.Description: You deal extra damage to halflings

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Human
EnhancementSelection.Description: You deal extra damage to humans

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Magical Beast
EnhancementSelection.Description: You deal extra damage to magical beasts

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Monstrous Humanoid
EnhancementSelection.Description: You deal extra damage to monstrous humanoids

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Orc
EnhancementSelection.Description: You deal extra damage to orcs

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Plant
EnhancementSelection.Description: You deal extra damage to plants

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Reptilian
EnhancementSelection.Description: You deal extra damage to reptiles

EnhancementSelection.Name: Favored Enemy: Vermin
EnhancementSelection.Description: You deal extra damage to vermin

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Heavy Draw
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: While Heavy Draw is active, you deal +5 damage with archery and thrown attacks. Effects that modify the attack penalty and damage bonus of the Power Attack feat also modify this ability (but other effects related to Power Attack do not). You also gain +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Multiplier to Longbows and Shortbows when toggled on. This ability has o effect when using a crossbow.

Stance.Name: Heavy Draw
Stance.Description: While Heavy Draw is active, you deal +5 damage with archery and thrown attacks. Effects that modify the attack penalty and damage bonus of the Power Attack feat also modify this ability (but other effects related to Power Attack do not). You also gain +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Multiplier to Longbows and Shortbows when toggled on.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Strikes Like Lightning
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +10% Doublestrike and +20% Doubleshot

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Devastating Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Deals +25% Damage +20 Critical Threat Range Cooldown: 12 seconds AOE Ranged Attack: Fire a single shot with +25% damage, hitting every enemy in an area around where the shot hits. Every hit is automatically considered a critical threat. On hit, blinds the opponent for 6 seconds. (Fortitude save negates, 14 + Ranger level + Dexterity Mod + Tactical Feat DCs)
Taking this ability also grants Critical Strike, a Melee version of the exact same ability.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Deepwood Stalker: Improved Archer's Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Archer's Focus Stance can now stack up to 25 times instead of 15. Passive: +10 Melee Power and Ranged Power
